name: Ominous Rumors
Lore: 'Rumors of a new ''technological terror'' filled the galaxy with dread.',
Text: 'Use 2 Force to deploy on Endor system if opponent controls no Endor sites. Your Force drains are +2 at up to X other battleground systems, where X = number of Endor sites you occupy. Effect canceled if opponent controls three Endor sites. (Immune to Alter.)',
